NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Fisheries and Regulations or the cell corresponding to Farm Management and Weather Impact?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Farm Management} and {Weather Impact} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Farm Management and Cost or the cell corresponding to Livestock and Cost?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Farm Management} and {Cost} has a higher heat value.
